name: Insulated Dog Coat
description: Water-resistant insulated coat with soft fleece lining. Keeps small to medium dogs warm during winter walks.

name: Reflective Winter Jacket
description: Lightweight reflective jacket with zip closure and tummy coverage. Great for evening walks.

name: Wool Sweater
description: Stretchy knit wool sweater designed for easy on/off and superior warmth.

name: Booties (4-pack)
description: Anti-slip winter booties to protect paws from ice-melt salt and cold surfaces.
